attributes.action: Stop the government using £9 million of taxpayers money on 'Pro Euro' mailshots.
attributes.additional_details: As grown ups we can make our own minds up. I also think that those who opt out should choose where their money is spent, mine is on the NHS. After all many of us were totally shafted after the election when the care cap was scrapped!
attributes.background: We live in a democracy so we should be able to opt out of receiving this mail shot. Moreover we should not prop a government who continually mis-use off shore accounts.
